ygData.subject: Re: Is there a usable list of bard songs?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ack, I want to get back into EQ dammit! =P Sometimes I don t want to comment on things because I haven t played in commercial yet (just moved and don t
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "John Robertson" <johnr@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Is there a usable list of bard songs?
>Date: Mon, 17 May 1999 18:36:51 -0400
>
>From: "John Robertson" <johnr@...>
>
> >
> > I'll let Jyzan or Mr. Kim or someone point you in the right direction as
>I
> > don't have any of the more descriptive lists linked from work (Jyzan,
>didn't
> > you update the eqvault list to be more detailed or something?)
>
>It has been updated, yes, up to level 20. There are some errors in it
>still (it says that Hymn and Chords only work on the pulse, when this
>isn't the case anymore) and some areas of debate (some people say
>Warsong and Anthem stack and others don't) and I think there's even a
>blatent instrument error (I think I said that the lament was a singing
>skill song), but overall, it's pretty thorough. The one that's floating
>around this list as a .doc is quite good too.
>
>Jyzan
>

Ack, I want to get back into EQ dammit! =P
Sometimes I don't want to comment on things because I haven't played in
commercial yet (just moved and don't have all my things yet). I'm not
totally keen on all the things that have changed since beta.

I DO distinctly remember Chant of Battle NOT working with Anthem (Lord knows
I tried it!) at that time. I also kinda miss the speed attack combo (ok I
really missed it, but I got over it).

Thanks

Sartori of Kelethin
